Section.title: Abstract
Section.Claim: Large Language Models (LLMs) can be improved with new prompting strategies.
Section.Evidence: "Our method shows a 15% improvement on benchmark X."

Section.title: Introduction
Section.Claim: Existing methods for fact-checking are computationally expensive.
Section.Evidence: "The process often requires significant GPU resources."

Section.title: Conclusion
Section.Claim: This paper presents a novel, efficient approach to automated fact-checking.
